roadmap.title: Programming Language Roadmap
milestones: Understand the Basics: Learn the syntax and basic constructs of the language
Advanced Features: Dive into advanced topics and language features
Build a Project: Create a project using the language
Contribute to Open Source: Contribute to open-source projects in this language
Achieve Mastery: Become an expert in the language

roadmap.title: Skills Roadmap
milestones: Assess Current Level: Evaluate your current skill level
Set Improvement Goals: Define specific goals to improve the skill
Practice Regularly: Engage in regular practice
Seek Feedback: Get feedback from peers or mentors
Achieve Proficiency: Reach a high level of proficiency

roadmap.title: Tools Roadmap
milestones: Install and Configure: Set up the tool in your environment
Basic Usage: Understand basic commands and operations
Advanced Features: Learn advanced functionalities
Integrate into Workflow: Incorporate the tool into your regular workflow
Optimize Usage: Use the tool more efficiently

roadmap.title: Frameworks Roadmap
milestones: Setup Environment: Install and configure the framework
Simple Application: Create a basic app using the framework
Best Practices: Study best practices and design patterns
Complex Applications: Build more complex applications
Master the Framework: Gain deep understanding and expertise
